post.title: sd850 - max video length 60 mins?
post.content: i have a canon sd850 with 8gb sdhc card and am trying to record video for more than 60 minutes. i currently have my movie mode set at 320x240 @ 15 fps, and the display says i can record 272 min 45 sec. however when i press record the most i ever get is 60 min. anybody else notice this problem?
